185901954.review:
Invaluable asset if you happen to work with firearms as a hobby or career! Wealth of information inside, very educational. Incredibly detailed models with accurate animations and easy sectioning. Full access DLC is entirely worth it should you intend to use it for this purpose. 

Otherwise, the slog of unlocking everything might take away from the experience. However, for the turbo-autists out there who just love this stuff, it'll be the gift that keeps on giving. Lots of gamified elements there for you.

Recommend any aspiring educators in this sphere seriously consider this as a tool to assist teaching core concepts of firearms principles. Full sapport saar

185296799.review: well i can see how people are mad that these guns cost money and that the start game is free, however i would like to point out that a lot of these guns are complex. Also the company probably has to buy one of each of these guns.... and then find someone qualified to take them apart without failing and damaging them..... and then they would have to either make a 3d model from each and every one of the parts. So that would be either they would need to take a picture of each and every angle of the part for 3d or they would have to make the part in some kind of 3d art software either way it would not be fun nor easy and you have to take this into consideration also i made up most of the things about the 3d stuff those are ideas of mine as to how that works and i am guessing. but still.... to aquire a harpers ferry flintlock pistol..... that would be hard anyhow im a gun enthusiast and if you had these guns irl you would know its worth it to know how to take them apart all the way to clean them...... (edit) alright i played the game a bit more and i hit the wall.... there is a problem with this games earn to win system so effectively it is a pay2win free game? so basicly look at the dlcs and add that cost in and you have the cost of the game..... still worth it to know about these guns if you have them irl.....

185273771.review: I'm in the Army. I used this game to go over the assembly and disassembly of certain weapons that I knew I'd have to work on in a competition but did not have access to beforehand. It was a useful refresher. It's also a fun way to just mess with guns. Definitely recommended.

185266260.review: this game can make a homeless beggar feel like an engineer.

185191830.review: If you want to be obsessive about guns and how they work and you want to know more about it it's pretty hard not to recommend this. The free to play mode is pretty slow but doable. The full access pack goes on sale sometimes though and for the tenner it was super worth it.

185180231.review: Absolutely great. With Full Access DLC it turns from a grinder to a BIG library of popular (and not really) guns. If I end up becoming a gun mechanic this can be used as a comprehensive guide on how not to break stuff. If you want to learn how it all operates I recommend turning on X-Ray 3, enabling Part Names and going on Slo-mo x50 (or even scrolling through it manually), poking, prodding and pointing at anything that interests you.

185101443.review:
The concept is good but the game is missing some of the basic features and is not very convenient.

* Some of disassebly and assembly sequences are not fully correct (disabling safety is not automatically cocking Makarov)
* As a consequence there is no way to check how double action works (e.g. for Makarov)
* Some parts are being removed automatically and by this you feel lack of control
* Camera movements are disrupting and sometimes it starts to rotate automatically which can cause dizziness
* Game has several modes which could've been united in one on two, but instead game forces you to assebly or disassembly the gun first to unlock other modes.
* Graphics is bad even for such a simple thing and default scene is terrible as well. Annoying music. Why would you even embed music here at all?
* You cannot unhide 1 detail, although you can hide it. Also it remains transparent, no way to hide detail completely.
* You cannot remove a detail and see what will happen (remove magazine and fire from this position)
* Game menus are terrible

UPD:

Checked for SVD and spring is attached wrong as well. What a shame. In CS no one cared about wrong animation of reloading, because the purpose of the game is completely different. But you have made a game about internals of the firearms and that is done wrong

184849927.review: World of Guns is a fantastic resource for weapon artists, offering detailed 3D models and breakdowns of firearms and other weapons. It’s great for understanding mechanical features, animations, and how different parts of a weapon work together. The ability to rotate and zoom in on models can be a big help in visualizing different angles and technical details that might be hard to capture from static images alone.

183671093.review:
Отличная энциклопедия оружия. Если вы купите полный доступ, а не будете как я медленно фармить стволы -- вы не заметите ключевых недостатков, или вам будет на них все равно. 

У игры есть серьезные проблемы в коргеймплее. А именно, не интуитивная разборка. Во-первых, после разборки деталь может быть расположена в воздухе неинтуитивным образом, что бессмысленно усложняет игру. Во-вторых, иногда деталь, которая по всей логике должна быть доступна для отсоединения, не может быть отсоединена из-за того, что разработчик заложил иной порядок сборки. Также, разный уровень "детализации" у оружия: на одной модели у затворной группы разбирается каждая маленькая деталька, а у другой -- затворная группа разбирается за один клик (особенно хорошо видно на РПК-74, АК и АК-74Н). Последнюю проблему я даже знаю как решить: вместо (или вместе с) ничего не говорящей "сложности", предлагаю ввести также уровни детализации, чтобы можно было примерно оценить сложность модели для себя.

Раньше здесь был раздел про недостатки монетизации, но его более нет. Игра предлагает более чем честную систему заработка премиумной валюты: проходите ежедневные пазлы (+3 кредита каждый месяц) и выигрывайте ежедневные состязания на конкретных моделях (+1 за модель, хотя, вроде, некоторые модели могут и по +2 кредита давать, если верить Вики). Новые модели можно получить, введя специальные коды (50 игрокам бесплатно, главное успеть -- следите за новостями внутри игры). Плюс, каждый год 1000 игроков могут получить 11 моделей на аккаунт бесплатно.

183636830.review:
The game's premise is to gradually learn the inner workings of a gun, and to then speedrun the disassembly and assembly of said gun, which is fun.

However, it has too much paid elements (understandable for a free game) which kick in as soon as the third gun beacuse you will not have enough XP to buy new guns unless you buy with real money from the store. You could complete extra hard challenges, but it is obvious the developers incentivize spending money on credits/XP.

183619338.review: if you are a gun nut or wanna learn more about firearms you should get this game, you can even order replicas of the guns so you can follow along irl!

183614681.review: It's a fun game to waste some time on
